advisory.name: RLBA-2022:2116
advisory.synopsis: iotop bug fix and enhancement update
advisory.topic: An update for iotop is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisory.description: For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Linux 8.6 Release Notes linked from the References section.

fixes.description: The 'iotop -p' command reports that 'CONFIG_TASK_DELAY_ACCT not enabled in kernel' if an invalid <PID> or kernel thread <PID> is used.
